Title: Missile strikes on Ukraine as Russian forces storm frontline town
Description: Missile strikes on Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy's hometown have injured 17 people, as Russian forces in the east are reportedly storming a town as they push to gain control of the whole of the Donbas.

Title: Musk vows to give away $1m a day to someone who signs his petition
Description: Elon Musk has promised to give away $1m a day until the US election to someone who signs his online petition.

Title: King Charles jokes about the 'sands of time' on Australia trip
Description: King Charles joked about the 'sands of time' and expressed his joy at being back in Australia as he addressed politicians.

Title: Difficult and big choices' coming in budget, minister warns
Description: The health secretary has warned of 'difficult and big choices' coming in the budget, while refusing to rule out that tax thresholds will be frozen.

Title: Moldovans head to the polls for two crucial votes
Description: Moldovans head to the polls today in a vote which could decide if the country moves closer to Europe or back towards Russia.

Title: Politics and pop don't mix well - here's why
Description: Most people see nothing wrong with going to a Taylor Swift concert, or taking your family along with you.

Title: Chancellor pledges £1.4bn for run-down schools and childcare
Description: Rachel Reeves has promised £1.4bn to rebuild crumbling schools and triple funding for free breakfast clubs, as she gears up for her first budget.

Title: Minister loses brief after complaint by Grenfell survivors
Description: A housing minister has lost her building safety brief after Grenfell survivors complained about her attendance at a conference sponsored by a firm criticised by an inquiry into the deadly fire.

Title: Minister loses brief after Grenfell survivors complaint
Description: A housing minister has lost her building safety brief after Grenfell survivors complained about her attendance at a conference sponsored by a firm criticised by an inquiry into the deadly fire.

Title: King and Queen to join Sydney church congregation as Australia tour begins
Description: The King will attend a Sydney church service to begin the monarch's first tour of Australia since his accession to the throne.

Title: Zayn Malik postpones tour dates after Liam Payne's death
Description: Singer Zayn Malik has announced he is postponing dates on his upcoming tour after the death of his former One Direction bandmate Liam Payne.
